Key Match Events: Daniel Mu√±oz scored the first goal for Colombia at the 32nd minute
Jefferson Lerma scored the second goal for Colombia at the 42nd minute
Julio Enciso scored a goal for Paraguay at the 69th minute to cut Colombia's lead in half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia have now beaten Paraguay three straight times at Copa America, matching the longest winning run they've ever had against that opponent in the tournament
Colombia have also won their opening game at four straight Copa America tournaments, their longest such streak since 1983 to 1993
Others: Colombia have an unbeaten run of 24 matches
